pages.title: Effective Search: Finding Mod Stuff
pages.text: When you have your inventory screen open you can use Just Enough Items (the item list and search bar on the right-hand side of the screen) to perform powerful searches.

Typing something in the search bar will search for it by the name of the item.$(br2)You can also search by $(l)mod$() -- if you use the $(l)@$() symbol.$(br2)For example...searching for $(o)@Croptopia$() will show you every item that the mod Croptopia adds to the game.$(br)This can be very powerful for understanding what items exist in the world.
